title: Mandate Integration Verification for Code Changes

comment:
PRE-REVIEW: COMPLIANT. All review criteria verified with evidence.

FRONTMATTER:
- title: "Mandate Integration Verification for Code Changes" -- present, non-empty.
- revision_summary: "Initial draft" -- acceptable for v0.1 per SOP-001 Section 5.1.

STRUCTURE: All 12 required sections per SOP-002 Section 6 are present: Purpose, Scope (2.1-2.3), Current State, Proposed State, Change Description (5.1-5.5), Justification, Impact Assessment (7.1-7.3), Testing Summary, Implementation Plan (9.1), Execution (EI table with 5 items), Execution Summary, References.

PLACEHOLDER CHECK: No draft-time {{}} placeholders remain. Execution-time [] placeholders are appropriately present in Sections 10-11.

CROSS-REFERENCES VERIFIED: SOP-002 Section 6.8, SOP-004 Section 9A.3, TEMPLATE-CR CODE CR PATTERNS and Sections 8/9, TEMPLATE-VAR Resolution Work Instructions -- all exist and are correctly referenced.

TECHNICAL CONTENT: Phase renumbering logic is sound (current 7 phases become 8 with new Phase 5 insertion). Advisory language ("should") for VAR integration verification is appropriate. Document-only scope is correctly assessed (no Sections 7.4/7.5). EI table maps cleanly to implementation plan.

No typos, formatting inconsistencies, or deficiencies found.

Post-review COMPLIANT. All verification items pass.

FRONTMATTER: title = "Mandate Integration Verification for Code Changes"; revision_summary = "Initial draft" (acceptable for self-authorizing executable document per SOP-002 Section 8).

EXECUTION RECORD: 5 EIs, all Pass, all signed "claude - 2026-02-15". No variances. Execution summaries contain substantive narratives with evidence.

DOCUMENT STATUS (SOP-002 Section 7.3 prerequisites): SOP-002 EFFECTIVE v10.0, SOP-004 EFFECTIVE v5.0, TEMPLATE-CR EFFECTIVE v5.0, TEMPLATE-VAR EFFECTIVE v2.0. All modified controlled documents confirmed EFFECTIVE.

CROSS-REFERENCES VERIFIED: (1) SOP-002 Section 6.8 contains two-category requirement (automated + integration verification) for code CRs with examples. (2) SOP-004 Section 9A.3 contains advisory paragraph for code-related VAR resolution with "should" language. (3) TEMPLATE-CR CODE CR PATTERNS references SOP-002 Section 6.8. (4) TEMPLATE-CR Section 8 has Automated/Integration subsections with guidance comment. (5) TEMPLATE-CR Section 9 has Phase 5 at 9.5, phases renumbered 6-8 at 9.6-9.8. (6) TEMPLATE-VAR Section 7 has code changes block referencing both SOP-002 Section 6.8 and SOP-004 Section 9A.3.

SEED COPY ALIGNMENT: Both seed copies match QMS EFFECTIVE copies exactly. Both revision_summary fields reference CR-084.

REVISION_SUMMARY TRACEABILITY: All four modified documents reference CR-084 in their revision_summary frontmatter.

PLACEHOLDER CONTENT: None found. TYPOS: None found. FORMATTING: Consistent. No SDLC prerequisites apply (document-only CR).
